      • mkSCC

        public static void mkSCC(int v,
         int[] visited,
         int[] low,
         java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> stack,
         boolean[] inStack,
         int[][] F,
         int time,
         java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> comps)
        Find a single SCC using Tarjan's algorithm
        Parameters:
        v - - a vertex in the graph
        visited - - array used to know which vertices have been visited once or not
        stack - - stack used to topologically order vertices
        inStack - - array to keep track of if a vertex has been removed from the stack
        F - - residual graph
        time - -
        comps - - List that each SCC found gets added to
        low - - the smallest index of any vertex known to be reachable from v, including v itself

      • BFS

        public static Edge[] BFS(PlanarGraph D,
         Vertex t,
         Vertex s)
        BFS to find the shoretest path between t and s in the contracted graph
        Parameters:
        D - - contracted planar graph
        t - - vertex that corresponds to t's location in the contracted graph
        s - - vertex that corresponds to s's location in the contracted graph
        Returns:
        an array of parent pointers used to construct the path

                                                Vertex s,
                                                PlanarGraph D)
        Constructs t-s path
        Parameters:

        t - - t's vertex in the contracted graph
        s - - s's vertex in the contracted graph
        D - contracted planar graph
        Returns:
